website_summaries.verdict: Lacks the bells and whistles of others we reviewed. Consider others on our list instead.
pros: A basic design that's geared towards newborns
cons: It's slightly more difficult to secure than others we reviewed and doesn't come in many color options

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR YOUR DOG TOO!
customer_reviews.text: I may get all sorts of crap for this but whatever.. I bought this for my 14 pound Jack Russell. She’s my first dog ever and the aging process is harder on me than it is on her. I didn’t know how she would react when trying to put her in it but it was no problem at all and within 4-5 minutes, she was totally asleep! I like to think she fell asleep so fast because she’s close to me but more than likely, it’s becwuse of the warmth. I love listening to her little heart beat! I highly highly recommend this for any dog mom or dad!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gabi Marvin

customer_reviews.title: Not hands free
customer_reviews.text: I bought this under the impression that it could be used hands free, but it cannot. For me that defeats the purpose of using a wrap. Despite following the instructions, there is no way that my 7 lb newborn can snugly stay in this wrap without at least one hand holding her in place. Disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: If I could give 0 stars I would
customer_reviews.text: This product is the worst purchase I've ever made. I tried to put it together via the instructions five times. It is not in any way sturdy enough to hold a HUMAN CHILD, also my 2 month old is way too big to even dream of fitting. So this product is terrible. Please invest in a better one.
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely unsafe
customer_reviews.text: This is such poor quality! I would not suggest putting anything you value in this mess! Very disappointing to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Tina M. Colley

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product! Worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is I absolutely LOVE LOVE LOVE this wrap!!!!! I am in love with the fabric! Easy to put on. Stretches so it fits my larger frame (lady shown with it is skinnier than me) I have larger bust and hips and still fits great! Baby boy loves to sleep in there for hours. I have Freedom to do things with my hands! I can now type on computer or so things around the house. I find Out of habit and security I keep my hand on his bottom. I love that we can stay skin to skin, it’s warm and comforting for the baby. I wish I could rate this 10 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Brown

customer_reviews.title: Seems dangerous. No instructions for baby
customer_reviews.text: This thing came with zero instructions on how to put the baby in the sling once it's on. Seems dangerous. Returning the item
customer_reviews.author: J from Houston

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: Would not buy this. Fabric was so stretchy, no matter how tight i tied it my baby would be loose after 5 minutes of wearing and almost fell to the floor wjen bending over. Threw it out. Not eorth droppimg him on his head.
customer_reviews.author: veronica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Newborns
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this for two months with my baby and have loved it. It’s his favorite place to be and will nap for HOURS in it. Easy to learn how to wrap using the instructions and YouTube videos. Thick French terry is perfect for winter, but I can see it getting hot in Summer. Now that he is bigger (15 lbs!) I’m dealing with him slipping lower as we are wearing it. Will be buying as a shower gift for other new moms for that snuggly newborn period.
customer_reviews.author: Photogirl

customer_reviews.title: UNSAFE
customer_reviews.text: This wrap is way too long and too strechy. After I could get it wrapped around myself, once I tried to put my baby in, he immediately started to fall out from the top even though I had the material stretched over his whole body. Baby's safety is obviously #1, so I went out today and bought an Infantino 4-in-1 carrier with straps and buckles. I'd return this, but I've never been so dissatisfied with a product that I've had to.. so I don't know how to. 😕
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Baby may not like it but it works
customer_reviews.text: It works. You can’t know whether your baby is going to like it or not tho. Look up a YouTube video on how to use it. There’s plenty. My son is 17 days old here.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda akaMEDA

customer_reviews.title: It's so much more comfortable for me and likely for baby too
customer_reviews.text: I have owned a Moby wrap and now a Sleepy wrap and I prefer the Sleepy wrap because of the stretchy knit fabric! It's so much more comfortable for me and likely for baby too! Only downside is because its stretchy after wearing for an hour or two I feel like the whole thing needs tightened again. This may not be a problem with smaller babies but it is for my 22 lb 6 month old! overall a great wrap though and I would recommend all moms have one! Such a lifesaver when getting groceries, making dinner, etc.
customer_reviews.author: kristin

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Initially, I was going to return it because it was sagging too much. I watched a few videos and it wasn't working for me. I gave it another try using the instructions given in the package and that worked out so much better. The YouTube videos werent helpful. It needed to be taut with no folding in the back and the intersection needs to be high on the back. I was doing it all wrong. Pros: washable, foldable, fits most babies Cons: can sag if not in right. Takes practice to put on. After a whike, you might need to readjust. Baby's head can be in an akward position.
customer_reviews.author: blah blah

customer_reviews.title: A must for newborns
customer_reviews.text: It took me forever to figure out how to use this, but once I got it, I used it all the time for my newborn. Carrying him was the only thing that calmed him when he had colic, and it also was easy to take him for walks. He did seem to get pretty warm when wrapped up, but that's probably with any wrap. It's easy to wash (I just threw it in with the rest of the laundry) and it hold up well. The only negative was that it really only worked for him theough the newborn stage, and then he seemed too big for it.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Just couldnt get it it to feel secure enough
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice material and the instructions are easy to follow. However, I had a 9lb newborn and no matter how tight i pulled the stretchy fabric it never felt like enough support to safely carry him around. He would hang down so low with his face seeming dangerously smashed against me no matter how I turned his head. I tried repositioning it several times and tying it a few different places but did not help. Also my boobs are huge F cup with nursing so I think that made it extra hard.to position him as well. Maybe better for smaller moms and babes.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Smay

customer_reviews.title: WORTH THE BUY IF YOU WANT TO KEEP HOUSE CLEAN
customer_reviews.text: What can I say it's a WRAP but make sure you do pay attention on YouTube videos if you do NOT know how to wrap your baby we wouldn't want you to drop the little Angel's. It does come with instructions on how to wrap but if you are a visual person like me watch YouTube videos there are many that will help you just have patience. It fit me and I am 210lb not to big in the middle area AKA STOMACH.
customer_reviews.author: Deisy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my fifth carrier and I love it! I have gotten the ktan (purchase to size, too big), two types of the internatio carriers and the moby. I was intimidated by this wrap because you must tie it. It's really easy and my baby loves being snuggled inside it. When I know I'm going to put her in it I put it on at home before leaving my house. It's so long I don't want it touching the floor/ground while out and about. I live in Hawaii and I can't see myself wanting to use this in the summer months though. The video is super helpful. The instructions are horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Your sanity will appreciate it and baby will live it
customer_reviews.text: I should of bought this before i gave birth to have it from day one. It’s amazing and frees your hands. Look up videos and practice practice practice. It gets super easy fast. Use a mirror. For newborns there are videos on how to make “pockets” so baby is nestled securely and now that he’s three months i could wear it without making pockets and having his legs on either side of me. You’ll see what i mean when you see it. Don’t have to buy expensive ones they work all the same and if you’re having problems with sagging try again.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen R

customer_reviews.title: My Maltipoo Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dog (maltipoo about 7-8 pounds) because he gets scared of loud noises and fireworks that happen frequently near my home. He absolutely loves it. He doesn't squirm or anything. And I can swaddle and comfort him while I keep doing whatever I need to do. Super convenient! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lucratif1

customer_reviews.title: Did not feel my baby was safe in this.
customer_reviews.text: This carrier comes with a piece of paper that has pictures with directions of how to tie the carrier to the mother's body. It does not, however, have any photographs or directions for putting a baby inside. Besides the warning label on the fabric showing positions NOT to place baby in, you're pretty much on hour own trying to figure out how to put your baby in comfortably and safely. My baby looked uncomfortably squashed to my chest when i put her inside and I didn't feel she was properly supported. I'm sorry to give such a terrible review but parents should know this before buying. I plan on sending this back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love, but highly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: While I wanted to love this wrap, I just don't. I bought this based off the reviews and I kind of wish I hadn't. After only putting my newborn in it once, took him out to change him and tried to put him in again, the wrap was way too loose. So I readjusted and rewrapped it. Same issue. No matter how many times I try to fix it. I ended up buying an expensive baby carrier that works so much better and he and I both love. I only wear this if I need to wear him sitting down and need my hands free.
customer_reviews.author: Little Hawaiian Turtle

customer_reviews.title: Not for me!
customer_reviews.text: I found this product super confusing and hard to use. The instructions are pretty clear, but they do not show what the end result should look like/how it should be, so I got to the end and had so many questions because it did not seem like it would hold a baby very securely at all. I put my baby in it and felt like she was going to fall out, and she screamed her head off/hated it. Unfortunately, I washed it before I tried it with the baby, so I regifted it to a friend for her to try.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Fincke

customer_reviews.title: It stretches to fit plus sized bodies.
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed this for the two or three times my son actually let me wrap him in it. Thank god that I was able to find this online for the price I did, versus purchasing it at Walmart or Toys-R-Us brand name. A lot of new mothers don't realize, not every baby takes to being worn. I enjoyed the way the fabric stretched (as I am a size 20 and was able to fully wrap it around). My only con is that I sometimes felt as if I didn't support him, he'd probably slip right on out. Also, I had my son during the summer and this was incredibly hot.
customer_reviews.author: Camille Davis

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the first purchases I made after having my baby. He loved when I carried him around in this wrap. I found it a little difficult to use at first but followed some guidelines on a youtube video. I now bring this everywhere and still use it with my 4 month old boy. I must note that I still support him with both hands when being carried in the wrap because I don't ever feel 100% confident that its secure but I do the same with all carriers.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen mc govern

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: It is very comfortable to wear. I wont say its like wearing another shirt because you can tell its there but its not like the old timer bulky ones that hurt your back. You get plenty of support with this one! My little one loves it as much as I do. The material is stretchy and soft. It also very simple to use!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Cano

customer_reviews.title: Research how to use before using, no instructions
customer_reviews.text: My main complaint is not with the product itself, but with the instructions that accompany it. I had never wrapped a baby before, and I'm glad I had the sense to reach out to friends before trying baby in this. The directions for use are extremely vague and don't even tell how to put baby in or the proper way to adjust the wrap to your body. It ended up not working for us so it was donated just adding to the frustration.
customer_reviews.author: christopher p.

customer_reviews.title: Too short and stretchy
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the boba wrap, this wrap is way too short. I was barely able to tie it around my new mama belly (I am average weight and height) and my husband was unable to wear it at all. Material also has more stretch compared to the boba, especially over time. Baby doesn’t really feel secure without one of my hands holding him, which really defeats the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Not the easiest to use.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice stretchy wrap. The material is kind of like a cotton jersey. However, this thing is SO long!! It’s really hard to put on, and baby is screaming by that time. It drags the floor (I’m 5’3”, so not the tallest, but it puddles on the floor.) until I can get it wrapped around and around. I could never see myself using it out somewhere because I wouldn’t want to have to try to get it on, and have it all over the ground. I use an ergo carrier much more.
customer_reviews.author: bmhnpb

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and easy to learn how to wrap
customer_reviews.text: I love this wrap! I do wish it was available in other colors. I had to return the first one because the stitching was coming undone but replacement is perfect so far! I use this a lot! My baby is 7 weeks now and I started using when he was about 2 weeks. I also have an ergo but he managed to curl so that his head was too low even at the lowest setting. I like this one right now that he is a newborn. It is comfortable to sit with/ the ergo is not.
customer_reviews.author: Vampire D

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but can't be worn for long periods
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful while worn and very flattering. Once you wash it, the edges begin to curl and I don't like that very much. Also, living in city, I'll walk places and after about 45 minutes I feel that the baby has slipped down from his initial position. I always find myself having to reset the wrap after a certain timeframe or hold baby with one hand by his bottom to get back home while I'm pushing another kid in a stroller. It's not the most fun task. I hope I'm wearing it properly, but I've done it very very tight and it still manages to loosen.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie P.

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: I find this pretty comparable to a more expensive wrap I used with my first baby. It's built a little different, but it works just the same. My daughter is only a few days shy of 3 weeks old, but I've been using it since she was a few days old and only 7lbs 5oz and would say you could use it for smaller babies. I hope it lasts for a good while.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for first few weeks
customer_reviews.text: This worked out great! I used it whenever I went out with the baby or even around the house. It is hard to figure out as the instructions aren’t the best but I watched several YouTube videos until I got it down. I found it’s not the best after a certain point, I used it recently my baby is now 10lbs and he was sagging far down it was hard to keep him up, even with making the fabric as tight as I could, it’s got a lot of elasticity which is good and bad. Overall I’m glad I got it and definitely got my money’s worth. Would recommend it for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Erinlazgrant

customer_reviews.title: Waste
customer_reviews.text: I honestly hate this product. The paper tying 101 they give you works ‘okay’. I still had to go on their YouTube channel to make sure I did it right, which I did but the woman goes way too fast for an instructional video. I tried to get my sweet girl in it and oh my gosh she screamed so loud. There is soo much fabric and it’s so tight that putting her legs in the right spots and having her body be where it was supposed to go it was pushing her legs up and ridding them up into her stomach. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: TAG

customer_reviews.title: Returned mine
customer_reviews.text: WAAAAYYY too stretchy for me. My newborn daughter was constantly drooping in it within minutes. I'd tie it as tight as I could to make her lay at chest and before I knew it, she was dropping down onto my belly. Also, this thing is SWELTERING. I thought I was going to burst into flames while wearing this thing. Material was way too warm to wear!
customer_reviews.author: amanda_pants

customer_reviews.title: LOVED IT
customer_reviews.text: Loves my wrap! Very versatile and came in handy. My daughter was first born I was in a wheelchair and transitioned to a walker by the time she was 3 months old. This wrap was a life saver for me as I was able to carry her around with me and still be mobile. Highly, highly recommend! I’m still using it now!!
customer_reviews.author: Adam W.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this it is so breathable even in hot weather I get good compliments on it every time I pull it out. Very soft streachy cute , and I'm a big girl and it fit good around me. And I take It everywhere i know I'm gonna do alot of walking or using my hands alot. Baby loves it he sleeps everyone I put him in it.
customer_reviews.author: Drea

customer_reviews.title: but never in a wrap like this because I thought it was too complicated
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 kids and have worn all of them in various things, but never in a wrap like this because I thought it was too complicated. I must say, I was wrong! I tried out the moby and was not impressed and would not spend 50 bucks on it. But this seemed to be better fabric and for 16 bucks, what did I have to lose? I bought another one for a friend for her shower! I've recommend it to several!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Baby wrap
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic for wrapping up a newborn who w/b glued to mom’s chest 6-12 hours a day - the first few months. Super easy to clean & handle. Its also shorter in length than other wraps we have. Will buy again - if we need another. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: matt cecil

customer_reviews.title: too hot, too difficult
customer_reviews.text: can't judge how well it holds baby because it's a nightmare to wear... can't get it adjusted right because it's too long and too hot... no way to adjust it once it's on, and no way to know how tight to pull anything without having the baby "in" it already (impossible)
customer_reviews.author: umumummummummmm

customer_reviews.title: Now that I am more comfortable holding her and caring for her
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my first baby and I was too scared to put her in it the first two weeks bc she was born small. Now that I am more comfortable holding her and caring for her, I decided to put her in it today and I am so glad I did. I can keep an eye on her and have my hands available to do things around the house. I am even typing this review with her in it. Really like this wrap and recommend it for any new mom. I can also see it being very helpful if you already have another small child and then have a newborn.
customer_reviews.author: Harlan Heath

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a lifesaver, upon opening the package I was a little frustrated with the instructions but after watching a youtube video I got it down. My daughter INSTANTLY fell asleep in this, as a full time mom and student, I can finally get what I need done around the house :) The support is great for her and the material is breathable so neither of us get sweaty using it, overall a great product for a low price
customer_reviews.author: candice a.rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Not for petite women
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this to work for me. I tried multiple times to get it on properly. Watched tutorials and even had my husband help me but still did not feel comfortable enough to use it with my infant. Very loose and not safe for baby. A lot of fabric to work with. Being petite might of made this the reason for not fitting on me. Would not recommend for petite women. I will try a carrier from my local target.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette

customer_reviews.title: This wrap is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Don't get a Moby that costs WAY more and isn't nearly as good! love this wrap so much! It took watching a YouTube tutorial or two but after a couple of times of wearing it I can put it on fast without issue. I put it on in the morning and wear it nearly all day. My baby loves it, my toddler loves it, and I love it. Recently purchased a Moby and it was such a waste of money. I should have just gotten a 2nd Sleepy wrap.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Hands free and great for moms
customer_reviews.text: This wrap is a lifesaver. It is soft on baby's skin, but durable and secure. It comes with an insert on how to apply it, but you can also look on YouTube for a step by step. It's also a great way to do skin to skin and be mobile. Newborns like to be close to mom and this allowed that without me being tied to the bed or couch all day
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great for bigger mommies
customer_reviews.text: It was soooo easy to use after I watched a YouTube vid.. my gosh this Is going to save me big time!! As that skin to skin did a number!! AND THE BEST ISNIM A BIGGER MOMMY 2X/3X AND IT FITS GREAT!!! I'd honestly say it would fit a mommy of 4-5x just fine... So all fellows bigger mommies this ones for us!!!
customer_reviews.author: Juana Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Love it! So helpful.
customer_reviews.text: This makes life so much better with a newborn. I am actually able to get things done around the house while baby sleeps happily snug to me. Very easy to put on after a few good tries. I youtubed a good how-to video. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: christyg2788

customer_reviews.title: Works great for new moms!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed using this when my baby was a new newborn up until she was about 1 1/2 months. After that it's just easier to get a carrier with buckles or something, if you're going out in public with your baby and wearing her/him. This wrap is nice for around the house since the wrap is so long you're most likely not going to be able to keep the ends from hitting the ground...I liked it and most likely will be using it again for when the next baby comes.
customer_reviews.author: Rylie H.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first. I read that it's only 13 ft long. I'm only 5'2" and over 200lbs. I wasn't sure if the length will be long enough to wrap it around me. I'm glad I bought it. I wouldn't mind it if it's a bit longer but the fabric is just enough to wrap it around me once and a double knot. It is super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: TP

customer_reviews.title: Cheap-but good.
customer_reviews.text: This product works great for my child. I had to use YouTube for better directions, but it works great. He loves to be in my arms. My only complaint is that the fabric could be a little longer. I’m 5’2 and around 170lbs postpartum- carrying a 10lb baby. Not sure how much longer I will be able to use this due to lack of slack. I continue to rate this product highly because the lack of slack also makes it feel more secure carrying him.
customer_reviews.author: Keia S

customer_reviews.title: My favorite baby product by far!!
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this product to any mama!! It's been a lifesaver for me-especially since I'm raising our second baby right alongside our toddler. My baby loves it and always catches a good nap when he's placed inside it. I can get some chores done or play with our toddler when wearing this carrier all while also giving baby some time off of his head. I don't understand why some of the reviews complain about this product being unsafe. With a little practice, you get the hang of tying it and I will be buying this as a gift for new mom friends.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Copenhaver

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Love this carrier! It's so soft and has just the right amount of stretch to it! I was worried it wouldn't be that great since it was cheaper than the other ones people were recommending, but so glad I got it anyway! Definitely worth every penny, we use it every day around the house or to go on walks with our newborn. She loves sleeping in it while we're out walking the pups!
customer_reviews.author: Jazzasaures Rex

customer_reviews.title: A definite keeper!
customer_reviews.text: I love this wrap. I only used it a few times & I'm sure I'll use it more often because it is so comfortable & convenient. I use it at home when I need to get work done but my baby wants to be held. So he sleeps on me while I eat, clean up, do laundry... it took a couple times to get the hang of putting it on but it is pretty simple. I watched a YouTube video which helped me.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for wearing to work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because I needed something to wear to work while my baby was with me. It works great to keep him secure and comfortable while I worked. I kinda wish the fabric was a little thinner because it gets a little hot to wear given it's 100+ outside. Overall I really love this product and recommend it to moms, like me, who like to carry their little ones close and be hands free.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Berman

customer_reviews.title: Comfy baby carrier
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfy baby carrier. It’s made of soft stretchy material and is very easy to use. My daughter is almost 18lbs and after a while in the wrap I notice she starts to sag down from where we started. I used this quite a bit the first 3-4 months with her mostly to help get stuff done around the house while still bonding with her. Being in a carrier definitely helped calm her down. Anyone who has a baby that needs to be held I highly recommend one of these carriers.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten McIntosh

customer_reviews.title: Best wrap ever
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product long before these were made I used to carry my oldest in my shirt but no more stretching my shirts this is so easy. I love it my daughter is safe and comfortable in this wrap. My back doesn’t hurt my shoulders don’t hurt it’s like carrying her in my belly all over again easy.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca L. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Shower gift.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a shower gift. Do not know any particulars.
customer_reviews.author: doris

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver for a needy baby!!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I got this for my second baby. He's much more needy and cuddly than my daughter was. It can be frustrating figuring it out at first but practice makes perfect! Basically you cross it over in front to stand baby up in it ( I start him facing out then switch him facing in when he falls asleep) YouTube videos can help you figure this out. And cross it in the back just like the enclosed directions say when you want baby in feeding position. Love that it takes weight off my wrists and works as a cover feeding in public.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Voelker

customer_reviews.title: Only good for sitting not carrying
customer_reviews.text: Great for sitting and taking a quick nap while wearing baby but useless for standing or walking with baby. Baby creeps lower and lower in the carrier so quickly while I stand or walk around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Very secure
customer_reviews.text: Pros: comfy, secure Cons: tricky to wrap at first The first time I wrapped it, I had to get someone to help me. It was also a bit weird to figure out where exactly to put my baby inside the wrap, but once I figured it out it worked great! Not sure what people are complaining about this not being safe. My baby feels very secure. I can bend over no problem.
customer_reviews.author: LouieJ

customer_reviews.title: Regret buying
customer_reviews.text: I wish I spent more money and bought a solly wrap as now I will have to do that anyway. This carrier is made out of thick material that is not very soft and is kind of rough on the inside - right where the baby goes. What annoys me the most and makes it harder to use it are the edges that are curling in. The material does not stay flat at the edges. I will definitely not be able to use this in the summer due to material making the baby too hot inside.
customer_reviews.author: Lia

customer_reviews.title: I returned it...hard to put on and too hot
customer_reviews.text: I returned this after only having a week. The fabric is good quality but very hot once put on with your baby in it. I was sweating bullets! Very hard to put on I had to have my husband put it on me and it was still not that easy for him. I didn’t feel secure walking around with my baby in it. Would not purchase again or recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen S.

customer_reviews.title: It was so soft and I really wanted to like it, but even if it is wrapped super ...
customer_reviews.text: WAY too stretchy. It was so soft and I really wanted to like it, but even if it is wrapped super tight to start the baby sinks down after just 10-15 minutes and you find yourself retying it. My husband tried it as well (he's 6'4", so he used much more fabric than I did) and the same thing happened so we had to return it. Stick with the Moby.
customer_reviews.author: MtnFamily

customer_reviews.title: Great price and value!
customer_reviews.text: I love the thing! The only downside is that it is a little hot. Once you get the hang of putting it on and getting the baby in, it is great. My baby is currently 1 month about 7 lbs
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love it. Returned item
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this product but it took too long to set up and get on. The material didnt make me feel secure that my baby was supported. I even tried to pull tighter but then it felt like it was uncomfortable for me baby. So I returned it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany K

customer_reviews.title: Better than Boba & Moby
customer_reviews.text: Love the length of this carrier. I used a stretch boba wrap and standard moby with my first, but this is my favorite! I dont have a ton of fabric left over after wrapping baby up and it is stretchy enough that I can get a snug fit, but make adjustments to breastfeed without taking baby out! Moght be too short for a heavier person, I'm about 160ish right now and the fit is just right for a secure double knot with about 5 inches of tail left.
customer_reviews.author: Jody W.

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan. Hurts my back
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this because I'm a stressed mom looking for things that will help make things easier. Its not comfortable. Hurts my back, ties awkwardly and my baby gets overheated quickly because the material is thicker than I expected. Cant return it because I used it and the baby spit up all over it so now I'm stuck. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica G

customer_reviews.title: This is the absolute best item I have every purchased
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute best item I have every purchased. I do recommend however to view youtube for proper wear. The instructions didn't work for me. I used this today at the store and my munchkin was amazing and fell asleep while at the checkout. So much freedom!!!!! And with Fall in the air, it's the perfect season to use this. FYI- we do get hot and sweaty fast. But the weather will be cooling down.
customer_reviews.author: Rose B

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit for a postpartum belly
customer_reviews.text: If you are postpartum and still have the baby pouch stomach this sling will not fit properly. It would be helpful if the models in the picture had a more realistic postpartum body. I was hoping this would be an easier way to carry my newborn while interacting with my toddler but the sling does not fit well with a postpartum belly. Will try it on again in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Savanah Borchers

customer_reviews.title: Material is too thick and hot
customer_reviews.text: Work just like any baby carrier wrap. I returned mine because the material was too thick compared to the other name brand wraps and was too hot in addition to the body heat generated by baby and mom. The material also made it a little more awkward when wrapping and placing baby in a snug fit.
customer_reviews.author: Watson

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: So the instructions that came with this were confusing in my opinion. I just went on YouTube and figured it out in less than a minute! Very stretchy and durable! Also breathable material, it is about 85 degrees outside and my little one did not get too hot!
customer_reviews.author: BMH

customer_reviews.title: Keep this magical wrap in the car at all times
customer_reviews.text: After watching a few YouTube videos I’m a pro at putting this thing on. I’ve used it since day one and my baby is always so comfortable he falls asleep. Keep it in the car with you just in case someone isn’t feeling the car seat when your out shopping. I use this wrap at the grocery store every week. Leaving me with a happy baby and more room in my cart. Love this wrap!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This arrived quickly. Very easy to use and nice color!the stretch is fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Must have baby sling! I've never used a sling like this so I can't really compare to other brands. However this has been a lifesaver! It was a little tricky a first(I'll admit I practiced with a bag of sugar) I quickly got the hang of it. It came with good instructions. The material is sturdy and soft. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: bergen

customer_reviews.title: Easy and great instructions
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 15lb emotional support dog!! Up close and ready for an anxiety attack while traveling!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Gayle

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: This wrap is a lifesaver! I couldn’t do anything before I got it bc the baby constantly wanted held. Once it got here it came with clear instructions on how to tie it and I was able to put it on and go hands free. I’ve used this bad boy at home, in stores and even for family functions. Biggest key is to make sure you put it on tight, the fabric stretches once you place the baby, which is normal.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Faley

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: My BIL loves this product, but my husband and I had a hard time feeling like our daughter was secure in it. I’m sure it’s just because we aren’t quite used to that feeling. I’m also short with bigger breasts, so the fit didn’t work quite as well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Chapin

customer_reviews.title: Nice material, durable.
customer_reviews.text: I like the wrap but it does take some time to put on and my son often slips down when he’s not being held. This is my only wrap so maybe these are usual problems. We use it very frequently. Material is durable and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jayme

customer_reviews.title: I love this wrap it is super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love this wrap it is super easy to use, quick to put on, secure and baby loves it. It really lives up to its name my baby usually falls asleep after minutes of being in the wrap. Sometimes I even use just around the house when baby is fussy. The only thing I have to say is that the directions that came with the wrap were not clear, but I easily found a YouTube video which showed me how to use it correctly. Great purchase this is a must have item :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good support
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use for my 7 week old baby. I tried it several times and had no issues learning to wrap it. No matter how tight I would wrap, my baby head was still not supported enough and she would hang really low on my stomach. I couldn't be hands free. Returned, will be getting a real carrier instead.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Tuleneva

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I was really nervous about getting a wrap style baby carrier. I love it! It comes with instructions on how to use it that includes pictures. If needed, you can go on YouTube to be sure that you are wearing it correctly. If put on correctly, baby is snug and secure. My little guy is extremely happy being that close to me and snug from the wrap itself. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MOpheim9480

customer_reviews.title: Glad I have this thing!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first baby wrap so I don't have anything to compare it to but I love it. I wish I had one for my kids who are now grown. I watched a couple different videos and have it down pretty well. I've only used it with my newborn but even if that's all I get to use it for it was worth the purchase. It is so nice to be able to do things around the house hands free.
customer_reviews.author: Friend Fam

customer_reviews.title: So comfy!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great wrap and a nice price. Pretty much exactly like a pricier name brand and just as COMFY and soft for less. This has made it easier to get baby to calm down, get things done at home, grocery shop, and travel!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Pague

customer_reviews.title: Waste of $ for me. Wrap kept getting loose
customer_reviews.text: It’s like carrying a bag of rocks in spandex: Not sure if others will have the same issue as me but I purchased this wrap to carry around a 7lb 2oz newborn so I could go downstairs to cook/fill dishwasher etc during the day while on leave and I was only able to carry her in it for 15 minutes before I started feeling baby slipping down as the material stretched and knot loosened... I tried making knot tighter so material will have room to stretch And still stay tight but I didn’t like how uncomfortable and flat baby looked in. Used once... thought maybe I was doing it wrong... tried again following directions... same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Toya

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as more expensive options
customer_reviews.text: This worked great, had easy to follow instructions and after practiving a couple of times in the mirror, was able to use this easily with my baby. Whenever the wrap got dirty, I was able to wash it with everything else, and the material held up without a problem. Used more expensive versions, and this was just as comfortable. I felt like my baby was secure and because of this was easily able to get things done because my hands were free! Would recommend this to anyone because it is such a great option for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha H

customer_reviews.title: Love it Wrap
customer_reviews.text: easy to use, my child likes it. she ends up falling asleep or just staying quite. I use this when i go food shopping and have my 3 year old in the cart. family events or just being at home, when she doesn't want to fall asleep or lay down. but i need to get stuff down around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LIFE CHANGING
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for about 4 hours and it’s greatly bettered my quality of life. It took me an embarrassingly long time to figure out how to use the damn thing but with a couple of YouTube videos I got there. My 4 week old is so comfy in it and it frees me up to do everything (except pump). He feels very secure in there and is comfortable. This will be my go to baby shower gift in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Nickole D

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me unfortunately!
customer_reviews.text: The material is soft and the instructions are easy to follow. However I find that after a while the baby doesn’t sit as snug anymore and I have to constantly readjust so that he feels secure when I am out and about. I wish it worked for us.
customer_reviews.author: pree

customer_reviews.title: Not for us.
customer_reviews.text: Found out my baby has silent reflux and doesn't like being in a carrier whatsoever... This was too constricting to him. It felt really soft though. I had a hard time trying to figure out how to put it on with a screaming baby... This just wasn't for us. Nothing to do with the quality. I think it was great we just didn't get a real chance to use it. I would have really liked to though!
customer_reviews.author: lil' A

customer_reviews.title: Once you figure out the tie EXCELLENT
customer_reviews.text: Once I figured this out I love it!!! My son is just under 2 months 9 lbs and 23 inches and he adores this he snuggles in and goes to sleep with in minutes. It let's me play with my daughter who is 2.5 It takes a bit to figure it out, the pamphlet on how to tie is not that helpful but the trick I kept missing was it has to also cross in the front as well as the back. Over all we really enjoy this
customer_reviews.author: AO1524

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on brand names - get THIS
customer_reviews.text: LOVE!! So extremely comfortable and once you get the hang of the basic wrap, it's pretty easy to whip out and put on quickly. For it being significantly less expensive than a MOBY and other wraps, I was expecting super thin, poor quality fabric but I was very pleasantly surprised!! I have recommended this brand wrap to every mommy I know! It's a registry must have!!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. & Mrs. T

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me and my newborn
customer_reviews.text: I tried and tried, even enlisted help of friends to make sure I was wrapping it correctly... It did not work for me and my newborn boy. It was too loose to hold him without my arms.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: Love it, fits great and I’m plus size
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this wrap. Wasn’t sure I was going to. The first baby I had I used the other type of carrier with the snaps. I thought this might be less secure. But it’s perfectly secure, adjustable and cozy for baby. Also I was worried that it might not fit me since I’m plus size. I’m a XL sometimes XXL. But it fits well with plenty of slack. I’m sure it could even fit XXXL folk.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Jools

customer_reviews.title: Very good overall
customer_reviews.text: My son loves being in this. I took him on four flights while in this and he was very comfortable and slept most of the time. It's comfortable for me and for him. I will say that it is difficult to learn how to tie it correctly and comfortably. It is also a bit difficult to get your child into it. But very good overall.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey Nicholls

customer_reviews.title: Love this wrap!!
customer_reviews.text: My baby would never let me lay him down and when I did he would cry and cry. This wrap has been a life saver! It’s super easy to use, very comfortable for both myself and my baby and gives me the freedom to move about and get the things I need to get done finished!
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey

customer_reviews.title: Great Back Saver
customer_reviews.text: I’ll never go back to a backpack carrier after this. Love love LOVE these wraps. Carried a bigger baby around for an entire day and didn’t once feel it in my back!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I felt like you had to be a rocket scientist to figure this out. Frustrating product and as a new mom I dont have time to be frustrated. It took three of us to figure out how to put it on and even after that I was uncomfortable and so was my baby. Returned the item.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a plus size mom amd this fit very well! Material was a little thick. It felt very secure. I used it when my baby was very small. After bout 6 months I stopped using mine
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Love love this wrap!
customer_reviews.text: I love this wrap so much I bought it when my son was a week old and I had so much trouble figuring it out at first (I’m a new mom) lol but my son is Almost 6 months old and he still loves it! The only thing that sucks is it’s a little too thick to wear through the summer I get too hot and so does he however cleaning around the house I can keep him in it and we both be comfortable. I love the fact that I can also breastfeed with him in it! Totally worth getting this
customer_reviews.author: Helicoptermomma

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use and hot
customer_reviews.text: This is very difficult to use. I got it down after several tries, but the bambino gets so sweaty in there! I invested in a backpack pretty quickly after trying to use this. It's just one long piece of fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Brit

customer_reviews.title: awesome product for cheap
customer_reviews.text: received it today and couldn't wait to use it. i usually don't write reviews but this wrap is awesome. with my new born, i wanted to have her close and be hands free and this is exactly what i was looking for. not too expensive. might have to watch youtube for instructions as the instruction that came with it was not as detailed as i liked. awesome product and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Her

customer_reviews.title: Great for baby
customer_reviews.text: Ok it took me a while to figure out how to tie this. I finally found a YouTube video and it has changed my life! It is so much easier to just wear baby especially in that newborn stage when they just want to be held. My baby isn't a huge fan of it but I just bounce around and she falls asleep. I have used this so much since buying it. It's machine washable too. It may shrink some in the dryer but it easily stretches back out.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah McDonald

product_meta.title: Baby Wrap Ergo Carrier Sling by Sleepy Wrap - Dark Grey - for Babies from Birth to 35 lbs or About 18 Months…
feature_bullets: Use this wrap from NEWBORN up to 35 lbs TODDLER - the perfect registry gift for the new moms in your life.
Ergonomic - Stretchy material allows you to EASILY tie your infant snug in the wrap. The wrap is ERGONOMICALLY designed to distribute your baby’s weight so it doesn’t strain your back.
Easily fits inside your diaper bag and leaves room for formula diapers and wipes! Lightweight, portable and indispensable!
With your baby on your chest, you can conveniently BREASTFEED while wearing your little one. This has health benefits for both you and your little one.
Made with a soft blend of 95% cotton, 5 % spandex, it is MACHINE WASHABLE unlike a stroller or pram.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,883 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
